landing.beta.subtitle: Be the first to experience Lumi when we launch!
landing.beta.successMessage: We'll notify you when Lumi is ready for you.
landing.beta.title: Join the Beta Waitlist
landing.cta.heading: Build better routines,
landing.cta.subtitle: Start your journey with Lumi today. Lumi helps you begin tasks, show up on time, and build simple daily routines through timely check-ins and real accountability.
landing.faq.a1: Lumi is an AI-powered productivity companion that acts as your 'body double' - helping you stay focused, build habits, and overcome procrastination through real-time support and gentle accountability.
landing.faq.a2: A body double is a productivity technique where having someone present (even virtually) helps you stay focused and accountable. Lumi provides this support 24/7 through AI, so you always have a companion to help you get things done.
landing.faq.a3: Lumi learns your patterns, understands what you're avoiding, and provides personalized nudges and check-ins at the right moments. It's like having a supportive friend who knows exactly when you need encouragement.
landing.faq.a4: Lumi is currently in beta testing. Request access to try it for free and be among the first to experience AI-powered productivity coaching.
landing.faq.a5: Unlike passive habit trackers, Lumi actively engages with you through video check-ins, real-time conversations, and personalized interventions. We focus on accountability that actually works, not just tracking streaks.
landing.faq.a6: Many users with ADHD find Lumi's body double approach especially helpful. The real-time presence, gentle reminders, and non-judgmental support can be valuable tools for managing executive function challenges.
landing.faq.a7: Lumi is available as a web app and mobile app for iOS and Android. You can access your AI companion from any device, anywhere.
landing.faq.a8: Click the 'Request Beta Access' button on this page to join our waitlist. We're rolling out access gradually to ensure the best experience for all users.
landing.faq.q3: How does the AI coaching work?
landing.faq.q5: How is Lumi different from other habit apps?
landing.faq.q7: What platforms is Lumi available on?
landing.faq.q8: How do I request beta access?
landing.faq.title: Frequently asked questions
landing.features.awareness.description: Lumi learns when and where routines break down, and surfaces insights that help users recognize avoidance early. By identifying repeat friction points, Lumi helps users adjust routines before inconsistency turns into abandonment.
landing.features.awareness.title: Understand Your Avoidance Patterns
landing.features.bodyDouble.description: Lumi acts as a real-time accountability partner that checks in when it's time to act. Instead of reminders you can ignore, Lumi helps users initiate routines and follow through â€” without guilt or pressure.
landing.features.bodyDouble.title: Meet Lumi, Your AI Body Double
landing.features.checkin.description: Short video check-ins create a sense of presence and accountability â€” similar to body doubling â€” helping users start routines when motivation is low. Designed to be fast, lightweight, and frictionless.
landing.features.checkin.title: Quick Check-Ins That Trigger Action
landing.features.habits.description: Lumi turns habit tracking into habit execution. Users set routines, and Lumi checks in at the right moments to create accountability and consistency â€” turning good intentions into repeat behavior instead of forgotten lists.
landing.features.habits.title: Set a Habit. Lumi Will Check In.
landing.features.streak.description: Lumi tracks streaks and progress to reinforce consistency over time. Clear visual feedback helps users stay engaged, recognize momentum, and build habits that last â€” not just short-term motivation.
landing.features.streak.title: Make Consistency Visible
landing.footer.brandDescription: Your AI body double for beating procrastination and building lasting habits.
landing.footer.madeWith: Made with ðŸ”¥ for procrastinators everywhere
landing.hero.heading: An AI body double that builds
landing.hero.subtitle: Lumi is designed to help people begin â€” because starting is often the hardest part.
landing.testimonials.heading: Users are building consistency â€” and seeing real progress
landing.testimonials.quote1: I struggle a lot with sleeping on time and waking up when I plan to. Lumi doesn't force anything â€” it just checks in at the right moment. That small nudge has helped me go to bed earlier and start my mornings without overthinking.
landing.testimonials.quote2: Most days I know what I should be doing, I just don't start. Lumi helps me break that freeze. When it checks in, I'm more likely to get up, cook on time, and finish basic chores instead of postponing everything.
landing.testimonials.quote3: What I like about Lumi is that it doesn't try to manage my whole day. It just helps me begin. That's been enough to make simple routines like waking up early or eating on time feel more doable.
landing.testimonials.subtitle: Early user feedback from beta testers
